snippet: From their small brokerage firm, Themis Trading, Sal L. Arnuk and Joseph C. Saluzzi are helping lead the fight against the surge of computer-driven, high-frequency trading on Wall Street.
abstract: From their small brokerage firm, Themis Trading, Sal L. Arnuk and Joseph C. Saluzzi are helping lead the fight against the surge of computer-driven, high-frequency trading on Wall Street.

headline.main: Seeking a Speed Limit in High-Frequency Trading
